data.title: Camping Deutschbaselitz
data.meta_description: Camping Deutschbaselitz is a campsite in Kamenz, Saxony, located by a lake/recreational pond.The campsite has pitches with shade, pitches without...
data.text:
Information request

The contact form can be found below.

Your request will be sent on to Camping Deutschbaselitz. All further correspondence will be between you and the campsite directly.

After completing the contact form, you will receive an email with a confirmation link. To finalise your request, we ask that you click on the link.

Your request

1. You have received a confirmation of your information request in your mailbox.

2. Check your message and click the confirmation link in the message.

3. Your request will be sent to the campsite.

Please note: this form does not count as a booking at a campsite. You only have a booking when you have agreed that with the campsite.
